%%% SECTION 1: ACCESSING MORPHOGENS AND TIME.
%%% AUTOMATICALLY GENERATED CODE: DO NOT EDIT.

    global gOLD_K_PAR gOLD_K_PER gOLD_K_POL
    global gOLD_BEND_PAR gOLD_BEND_PER
    global gOLD_ARREST
    gpar_i = gOLD_K_PAR;
    Gpar = m.morphogens(:,gpar_i);
    gperp_i = gOLD_K_PER;
    Gperp = m.morphogens(:,gperp_i);
    polariser_i = gOLD_K_POL;
    P = m.morphogens(:,polariser_i);
